org.apache.archiva.repository.base

Class AbstractRepositoryGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.base.AbstractRepository
      • org.apache.archiva.repository.base.AbstractRepositoryGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, EventHandler<RepositoryEvent>, EventSource, EditableRepository, EditableRepositoryGroup, Repository, RepositoryGroup, RepositoryStorage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MavenRepositoryGroup

    public class AbstractRepositoryGroup
extends AbstractRepository
implements EditableRepositoryGroup
    Abstract repository group implementation.
